clinical_study.official_title: C-Cure - Safety, Feasibility and Efficacy of Guided Bone Marrow-derived Mesenchymal Cardiopoietic Cells for the Treatment of Heart Failure Secondary to Ischemic Cardiomyopathy

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this clinical trial is to evaluate the feasibility, safety and efficacy of left ventricular endocardial injection of guided bone marrow-derived cardiopoietic cells (C-Cure) in the setting of chronic heart failure secondary to ischemic cardiomyopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in left ventricular ejection fraction

clinical_study.condition: Heart Failure Class II or III
